Week 0

Sept 28 - Oct 1

Getting Ready for STATS 67

Notes Links Due
Getting to Know the Course Website     Take time go over the contents of this website, especially read the policies section. Do not forget to bookmark stats4cs.com.
Introduce Yourself to the Teaching Team The responses to this “quiz” will not be available to your classmates. The quiz is not timed. Oct 1, 11:59 pm
Get Your Tech Ready The responses to this “quiz” will help us make sure that you are ready for the first class in terms of your tech needs. The quiz is not timed. Oct 1, 11:59 pm
